# Overhead
```{r overhead, include = FALSE}
packages_vector <- c("arrow",
                     "stringdist",
                     "tidyverse")

need_to_install <-
  packages_vector[!(packages_vector %in% installed.packages()[, "Package"])]

if (length(need_to_install)) install.packages(need_to_install)

for (package in packages_vector) {
  library(package, character.only = TRUE)
}

```

# Remote I/O
```{r remote-io}
interim_dir <- "../../data/interim/"

input_survey_file_name <- paste0(interim_dir, "onboard-survey-trip-list.feather")
input_file_name_prefix <- paste0(interim_dir, "survey_")
output_file_name <- paste0(interim_dir, "on-board-survey-comparison-tableau.csv")

```

# Parameters
```{r parameters}

```

# Data Reads
```{r data-reads}
survey_df <- read_feather(input_survey_file_name)

input_df <- tibble()
for (access_egress in c("wtw", "dtw", "wtd")) {
  for (time_period in c("EA", "AM", "MD", "PM", "EV")) {
    for (set in seq(1:3)) {
      
      file_name <- paste0(input_file_name_prefix, access_egress, "_", time_period, "_set", set, "_db.csv")
      df <- read_csv(file_name, col_types = cols(.default = col_double(),
                                                 Unique_ID = col_character(),
                                                 npath = col_integer(),
                                                 maz_o = col_integer(),
                                                 maz_d = col_integer(),
                                                 tap_o = col_integer(),
                                                 tap_d = col_integer(),
                                                 period = col_character(),
                                                 skim_set = col_integer())) %>%
        mutate(access_egress_path = access_egress)
      
      input_df <- bind_rows(input_df, df)
      
    }
  }
}

```

# Reductions
```{r reductions}
working_df <- input_df %>%
  mutate(lb_time = replace_na(lb_time, 0.0)) %>%
  mutate(eb_time = replace_na(eb_time, 0.0)) %>%
  mutate(fr_time = replace_na(fr_time, 0.0)) %>%
  mutate(hr_time = replace_na(hr_time, 0.0)) %>%
  mutate(lr_time = replace_na(lr_time, 0.0)) %>%
  mutate(cr_time = replace_na(cr_time, 0.0)) %>%
  mutate(network_path_string = if_else(lb_time > 0.0, "LB-", "XX-")) %>%
  mutate(network_path_string = if_else(eb_time > 0.0, paste0(network_path_string, "EB-"), paste0(network_path_string, "XX-"))) %>%
  mutate(network_path_string = if_else(fr_time > 0.0, paste0(network_path_string, "FR-"), paste0(network_path_string, "XX-"))) %>%
  mutate(network_path_string = if_else(hr_time > 0.0, paste0(network_path_string, "HR-"), paste0(network_path_string, "XX-"))) %>%
  mutate(network_path_string = if_else(lr_time > 0.0, paste0(network_path_string, "LR-"), paste0(network_path_string, "XX-"))) %>%
  mutate(network_path_string = if_else(cr_time > 0.0, paste0(network_path_string, "CR"), paste0(network_path_string, "XX"))) %>%
  mutate(network_boardings = if_else(is.na(xfers), 1L, as.integer(xfers) + 1L)) %>%
  select(survey_id = Unique_ID,
         orig_maz = maz_o, 
         dest_maz = maz_d,
         path_number = npath,
         access_egress_path,
         boarding_tap = tap_o,
         alighting_tap = tap_d,
         time_of_day = period, 
         network_boardings,
         skim_set,
         network_path_string) 

survey_join_df <- survey_df %>%
  mutate(time_of_day = case_when(
    day_part == "EARLY AM" ~ "EA",
    day_part == "AM PEAK" ~ "AM",
    day_part == "MIDDAY" ~ "MD",
    day_part == "PM PEAK" ~ "PM",
    day_part == "EVENING" ~ "NT",
    day_part == "NIGHT" ~ "NT",
    TRUE ~ as.character(NA),
  )) %>%
  mutate(survey_path_string = if_else(local_bus_in_path == 1, "LB-", "XX-")) %>%
  mutate(survey_path_string = if_else(express_bus_in_path == 1, paste0(survey_path_string, "EB-"), paste0(survey_path_string, "XX-"))) %>%
  mutate(survey_path_string = if_else(ferry_in_path == 1, paste0(survey_path_string, "FR-"), paste0(survey_path_string, "XX-"))) %>%
  mutate(survey_path_string = if_else(heavy_rail_in_path == 1, paste0(survey_path_string, "HR-"), paste0(survey_path_string, "XX-"))) %>%
  mutate(survey_path_string = if_else(light_rail_in_path == 1, paste0(survey_path_string, "LR-"), paste0(survey_path_string, "XX-"))) %>%
  mutate(survey_path_string = if_else(commuter_rail_in_path == 1, paste0(survey_path_string, "CR"), paste0(survey_path_string, "XX"))) %>%
  select(survey_id = Unique_ID,
         operator, 
         route,
         survey_path_string,
         survey_boardings = boardings,
         boarding_weight,
         trip_weight)

all_df <- left_join(working_df, survey_join_df, by = c("survey_id")) %>%
  mutate(path_difference = stringdist(network_path_string, survey_path_string)/2.0) %>%
  mutate(path_match = if_else(path_difference == 0, 1L, 0L)) %>%
  mutate(boardings_difference = abs(network_boardings - survey_boardings)/10.0) %>%
  mutate(decimal_path_diff = path_difference + boardings_difference) %>%
  group_by(survey_id) %>%
  mutate(simulated_path_count = n(), 
         path_matches = sum(path_match),
         minimum_path_difference = min(path_difference),
         minimum_decimal_path_difference = min(decimal_path_diff)) %>%
  mutate(at_least_one_path_match = sum(path_match) > 0L) %>%
  ungroup() 

best_df <- all_df %>%
  filter(decimal_path_diff >= minimum_decimal_path_difference) %>%
  group_by(survey_id) %>%
  mutate(min_path_number = min(path_number)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  filter(path_number == min_path_number) %>%
  select(survey_id, path_number) %>%
  mutate(best_match = TRUE)
  
output_df <- left_join(all_df, best_df, by = c("survey_id", "path_number")) %>%
  mutate(best_match = replace_na(best_match, FALSE))
```

# Write to Disk
```{r data-write}
write_csv(output_df, path = output_file_name)
```
